tier.item: (1) Dime bylo skuchno / grusno / smeshno
Dima-dat was-3rd-neut bored-adv / sad-adv / funny-adv
`Dima felt/was bored / sad / like laughing'

tier.item: b. # Mne bylo special'no grusno chtob vyzvat' sochustvie k sebe
Markman 3
Me-dat was purposefully sad-adv to call-out pity to self
`I felt sad on purpose to make other people feel sorry for me'
